Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Angazhan]{Angazhan}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Asmodeus]{Asmodeus}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Barbatos]{Barbatos}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Dispater]{Dispater}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Droskar]{Droskar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Gogunta]{Gogunta}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Mephistopheles]{Mephistopheles}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Pazuzu]{Pazuzu}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Godclaw]{The Godclaw}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Treerazer]{Treerazer}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Walkena]{Walkena}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Touch of Obedience]{Touch of Obedience}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Commanding Lash]{Commanding Lash}

You wield power to rule and enslave others.
name: Tyranny Domain
